name: CyberLight Rider
description:
Firefox audio issue now fixed.

Steal data like a future fagin by getting in sync with the datastreams and collecting the largest pay packet this side of the future. Collect the goods, then Tweet your score!

The aim of the game

  • Steal data by changing your jacket colour to match the datasteam you are riding.
  • The datastreams are ordered in levels of greed, the higher datastream pipe you ride, the faster the data is transferred to you.
  • The higher datastream pipes have more traps. Top transfer rate, but its not easy being greedy.

Controls

A - JUMP

L - CHANGE COLOUR

Backspace - PAUSE

-

Game Over

Enter - RETRY

M - MAIN MENU

T - TWEET SCORE

Twitter: @datanode1

Website: infeck.com
